#include <stdio.h>
int cal(char *a,char *b,int m,int n)
{
    int result=0,i,j;
    int dp[m+1][n+1];
    for(i=0;i<=m;i++)
    {
        
        for(j=0;j<=n;j++)
        {
            
            if(i==0 || j==0)
            dp[i][j]=0;
            
            else if(a[i-1]==b[j-1])
            dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j-1]+1;
            
            else
            dp[i][j]=0;
            
            result=result>dp[i][j]?result:dp[i][j];
        }
        
    }
    
    return result;
    
}
int main(void) {
	// your code goes here
	int m,n;
	scanf("%d %d",&m,&n);
	char a[m],b[n];
	scanf("%s",a);
	scanf("%s",b);
	int ans=cal(a,b,m,n);
	printf("%d\n",ans);
	return 0;
}
